description: Golden dataset for Treasury IntakeAgent extraction evaluation

documents.content:
From: CFO@acme.com
To: Treasury@acme.com
Subject: Q4 Cash Position Update

Team,

Please note that our current cash position as of December 31st is $45.2M across all accounts. The main operating account at Chase has $32.1M, and our sweep account at Goldman has $13.1M.

We need to execute a wire transfer of $5M to our European subsidiary by January 15th for their Q1 operating expenses.

Also, I noticed our daily cash forecast is showing a potential shortfall of $2.3M in the third week of January due to the large vendor payments scheduled.

Please review and advise on our options.

Regards,
John

DAILY TREASURY REPORT
Date: January 10, 2025
Account: ACME Corp Operating Account #4521

Opening Balance: $28,450,000.00

Credits:
- ACH Deposit - Customer Payment: $1,250,000.00
- Wire In - Investment Maturity: $3,000,000.00

Debits:
- Wire Out - Vendor Payment: ($2,100,000.00)
- ACH Debit - Payroll: ($4,500,000.00)

Closing Balance: $26,100,000.00

Alert: Balance dropped below $27M threshold

COUNTERPARTY EXPOSURE REPORT
Generated: January 8, 2025

Bank of America:
- Total Exposure: $52,000,000
- Limit: $50,000,000
- Utilization: 104%
- STATUS: LIMIT BREACH

JP Morgan Chase:
- Total Exposure: $43,000,000
- Limit: $75,000,000
- Utilization: 57%
- STATUS: OK

Citibank:
- Total Exposure: $28,500,000
- Limit: $30,000,000
- Utilization: 95%
- STATUS: WARNING - Approaching Limit

FX POSITION ALERT

Urgent: EUR/USD position requires attention

Current Position: Long EUR 15,000,000
Mark-to-Market: -$425,000 (2.8% loss)
Stop Loss Level: -$500,000 (3.3%)

The position has moved against us following the ECB announcement. We are approaching our stop loss threshold.

Recommendation: Consider partial hedge or position reduction.

Trading Desk

INVESTMENT MATURITY SCHEDULE
Week of January 13-17, 2025

Monday, Jan 13:
- Treasury Bill (91-day): $10,000,000 maturing
- Commercial Paper (ABC Corp): $5,000,000 maturing

Wednesday, Jan 15:
- Certificate of Deposit (Wells Fargo): $8,000,000 maturing

Friday, Jan 17:
- Treasury Note (2-year): $15,000,000 maturing

Total Maturities This Week: $38,000,000

Reinvestment Decision Required by Jan 10, 2025
